repairedDockerfile:
# AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY travis-run WILL BE OVERWRITTEN UNCONDITIONALLY!
## To modify the environment for your builds modify the Dockerfile in
## .travis-run/$VM_NAME in your project directory instead.
FROM %FROM%

CMD ["/sbin/init"]
EXPOSE 22

WORKDIR /root

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y openssh-server; rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*; mkdir /var/run/sshd

ADD base-install.sh       /root/
ADD Gemfile               /root/
ADD Gemfile.lock          /root/
RUN /root/base-install.sh

ADD base-configure.sh     /root/
ADD travis-run_id_rsa.pub /root/
RUN /root/base-configure.sh travis
